articles-2.title: Haley exits race, creating a Biden-Trump rematch
articles-2.content: As his last major rival drops out, Trump becomes the presumptive Republican nominee, setting up a November showdown with Biden

articles-2.title: Trump vs Biden elections
articles-2.content: The general election is here and it’s Trump vs. Biden

articles-2.title: Justices ruled Trump couldn’t be removed from Colorado’s ballot, a sweeping ruling that brushed aside whether he is an insurrectionist
articles-2.content: The Supreme Court on Monday ruled that former President Donald Trump could not be removed from the ballot in Colorado or any other state
